department: Department of Fisheries and Oceans - Material and Procurement Services
short_summary: Provide Telemedical Assistance Service (TMAS) to vessels operating within the Canadian Coast Guard Search and Rescue Region (SRR) 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days year.
description: Telemedical Assistance Service for the Canadian Coast Guard
duration_in_months: Inicial contract period: November 1, 2023 to October 31, 2024 inclusive followed by 3 option periods.
full_summary:
====================================

### Telemedical Assistance Service for the Canadian Coast Guard

#### Solicitation No. and Title

* Solicitation No.: 30004539-001
* Title: Telemedical Assistance Service for the Canadian Coast Guard

#### Date and Time of Tender Due Date

* The tender closing date is Wednesday, October 11, 2023 at 14:00 Eastern Standard Time (EST).
* The amendment date is October 11, 2023.

#### Contract Dates

* The expected contract start date is November 1, 2023.
* The expected contract end date is October 31, 2024.

#### Procurement Details

* The procurement category is Service (SRV).
* The tender notice type is a Request for Proposal (RFP).
* The procurement method is Competitive - Traditional.
* The selection criteria is the combined rating of technical merit and price.

#### Description of the Service

The provision of Telemedical Assistance Service (TMAS) to vessels operating within the Canadian Coast Guard Search and Rescue Region (SRR) 24/7/365.

#### Additional Files

* [Addendum 1 for the RFP](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/12027/30004539---addendum-addenda-1.pdf)
* [Fleet Logistics Manual](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9037/coast-guard-fleet-logistics-manual-400.00.07-pharmaceuticals%2C-medical-supplies-and-related-items_0.pdf)
* [RFP Final Draft](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9037/30004539_rfp_final_0.pdf)

#### Contact Information

* Name: Tina Brown
* Email: [Tina.Brown@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:Tina.Brown@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
* Phone: (506) 238-3224
* Address: 301 Bishop Drive, Fredericton, NB E3C 2M6, Canada


This revised version rephrases the original text, keeping the same structure and flow, but focusing on a clearer and concise presentation of the information for the government tender. The additional files and contact information are retained, including the language peculiarities of one of the files in French.
